QuestData.Title: Mystery Solved
QuestData.Description: Your efforts have paid off. The great risks you have taken have proven worthwhile.$b$bYou have discovered the object of the nagas' desire and their reason for overrunning the coast of Desolace.$b$bAs for the engravings you've discovered, your duty is clear...
QuestData.LogDescription: You are to bring the Ancient Engravings of Neptulon to Cenarion Researcher Korrah.
QuestData.RewardText: The vision was true!$b$bYou have singlehandedly succeeded where others have failed.$b$bThe Circle will have no choice but to pay attention to these findings.
